title: Peru Interbank Three Month Rate
description: Peru Interbank Three Month Rate was at 0.81 percent on Wednesday November 9. Interbank Rate in Peru averaged 4.22 percent from 2002 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 551.65 percent in January of 2016 and a record low of 0.04 percent in October of 2017. The interbank rate is the rate of interest charged on short-term loans made between banks in the local currency. This page provides - Peru Interbank Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Reserve Bank of Peru
